Politics.name: Politics
Politics.question1: Near a pedestrian crossing, when the pedestrians are waiting to cross the road, you should?
Politics.q2: Slow down, sound horn and pass
Politics.q4: Stop the vehicle and wait till the pedestrians cross the road and then proceed
Politics.question2: When a vehicle is involved in an accident causing injury to any person?
Politics.q21: Take the vehicle to the nearest police station and report the accident
Politics.q22: Stop the vehicle and report to the police station
Politics.q23: Take all reasonable steps to secure medical attention to the injured and report to the nearestpolice station within 24 hours
Politics.q24: Wait till the other vehicle crosses the bridge and then proceed
Politics.question3: On a road designated as one way
Politics.q32: Should not drive in reverse gear
Politics.question4: You can overtake a vehicle in front?
Politics.q42: Through the left side, if the road is wide
Politics.q44: Through the right side of that vehicle
Politics.question5: You are approaching a narrow bridge, another vehicle is about to enter the bridge from opposite side you
Politics.q51: Increase the speed and try to cross the bridge as fast as possible
Politics.q52: Put on the head light and pass the bridge
Politics.q53: Wait till the other vehicle crosses the bridge and then proceed
